Federal Register: 67. Desmedipham (CAS No. 013684-56-5) (FIFRA AI) (Ref. 3). In a 90-day dog study, groups of four beagles/sex were fed diets containing 0 to 5.24 mg/kg/day. This caused increased methemoglobin at 5.24 mg/kg/day (LOEL). EPA believes that there is sufficient evidence for listing desmedipham on EPCRA section 313 pursuant to EPCRA section 313(d)(2)(B) based on the available hematological toxicity data.
